room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape Indy in Indianapolis
review: We had a ball tonight! This was our first trip to Escape Indy, and we tried the James Bomb room. VERY challenging to say the least! We had no expectations because we didn't have a clue as to what to expect.It was very fun and we will definitely go back.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape Indy in Indianapolis
review: Escape Indy had a good set up and the person hosting us was great, very enthusiastic. We did James Bomb with 4 people - 3 teens, 1 adult. We got to the very end, just needed a little more time. Probably would have escaped with more bodies and minds, but we had a blast, good family bonding time! We would definitely do it again at this location.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape Indy in Indianapolis
review: We have done several rooms before at other venues. Escape Indy was professional, very clean and nice. We did the James Bomb room with only 4 of us and were one code and one minute from making it out. So, so close. We will visit again.

room_title: Escape room "James Bomb" by Escape Indy in Indianapolis
review: Went for my bachelorette party yesterday for the James Bomb room. There were 6 in my party and 2 couples that we didn't know, but were supppeerrr thankful they came! Without the other 4 we wouldn't have made it nearly as far!!! Jayla was our coordinator was amazing! She was very upbeat and friendly. Thank you Escape Indy and my teammates for making this such a fun and memorable bachelorette party!!!
